about_the_game:
Room231

Backroom: Room231 is a "hardcore" single player horror game, which is based on the famous creepy pasta called "Backrooms". In this game, you will need to find an exit of level231 while hiding from dangerous environments and entities. However, you will need to find every "objects" from other levels of backrooms to open the exit of level231.

Uncanny Rooms


Currently, Room231 has 9 levels. Level231 is a main level, which is the beginning and end map for the player's escape. It is a familiar place, but becareful. Uncanny experiences are waiting for you. There are 6 more levels that have "objects" which must placed in the right location in level231. While collecting these objects, player will be able to reach the truth of level231 and exit to live.
These are current levels:
1- Level 231
2- Level 6
3- Level 34
4- Level Maze(Original level)
5- Level 19
6- Level 69
7- Level 7
8- Level Bathroom(Original level)
9- Level Forest(Original level)

Entities


During your uncanny adventure, you will meet several entities. Some of them are based on the original backrooms, others are this game's original entities. Each entities have different patterns and gimmicks, so you would better to know that and find best way to esacpe from those.

Puzzles&Items


You will need to solve lots of puzzles during your journey for reach to every exits of backrooms. Each puzzles have unique and interesting gimmicks which requires you to think creatively. And to solve puzzles, to live, to hide from entities, you can use lots of items and tools. You can save them in their inventory, or hold them with hand. Those puzzles are quite hard to solve, so be prepare to wake up your brain.

Jumpscares


You will see some jumpscares in this game. Especially in early 30~ minutes of the game. Don't forget to massage your heart before playing this.

Future Updates

This game is still in development, so there might be some glitches&bugs.
Since I am a solo developer, it is hard to guarantee fast updates and reponses, but I will keep update Room231 and communicate with you guys for best creepy experience.

Feel free to broadcast&make videos with this game

If you encounter any issues&bugs feel free to send me: dudwlstldud@gmail.com

name: Room231

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change in future updates

short_description: Room231 is a single player horror game, which is based on the famous creepy pasta called "Backrooms". Player must find an exit to leave room231 and reach the truth of room231.
